de.ralleytn.simple.image

Class SimpleImageFX

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.ralleytn.simple.image.SimpleImage
      • de.ralleytn.simple.image.SimpleImageFX

  • public class SimpleImageFX
extends SimpleImage
    Extends SimpleImageFX to support JavaFX.
    Since:
    1.0.0
    Version:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Ralph Niemitz/RalleYTN(ralph.niemitz@gmx.de)

        Takes a screenshot and initializes the instance with it's data.

      • SimpleImageFX

        public SimpleImageFX(int[][] data)
        Wraps already existing data into an instance of SimpleImage. if one of the arrays on the 2nd dimension is too short or too long, errors may occur.
        Parameters:
        data - the already existing image data
        Since:
        1.0.0

      • SimpleImageFX

        public SimpleImageFX(java.io.InputStream inputStream)
              throws java.io.IOException
        Loads an image from an input stream. The input stream will not be closed automatically. The developer has to do it himself.
        Parameters:
        inputStream - the input stream to read the data from
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if an error occurs during reading.
        Since:
        1.0.0
